description.value:
A Pack containing devices such as well-made lock-picks, sound amplification and nullifcation devices, and specialised drills. Grants +20 to Security Tests to open physical locks, remove secured objects, or otherwise defy mechanical obstacles, and -20 to Awareness tests to overhear such activities.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: A Pack containing devices such as well-made lock-picks, sound amplification and nullifcation devices, and specialised drills. Grants +20 to Security Tests to open physical locks, remove secured object
